column5: Cosy private room in my home in the northern suburb of Dallas called Carrollton, close to all major highways, my home provides great accomodations such as a gym, a park with a great running and biking trail, your own private restroom, and I can even provide you a car rental, message me for details. Close to many restaurants and bars and only about a 20 min drive to Downtown Dallas. This room is perfect for all business and pleasure visits to great city of Dallas.
